thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Pence Promises ‘Most Aggressive’ North Korea Sanctions Yet

author: Alastair Gale
title: Pence Promises ‘Most Aggressive’ North Korea Sanctions Yet
text:
Vice President Mike Pence said the U.S. would soon announce new sanctions on North Korea as he warned that the country could be using its attendance at the Olympics to blunt international pressure aimed at forcing it to drop its nuclear-weapons program.
Speaking after meeting with Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe in Tokyo, Mr. Pence said the U.S. would impose the “toughest and most aggressive round of economic sanctions on North Korea ever” but didn’t provide specifics on the steps or when they would be introduced.
... RELATED VIDEO By opening the door to dialogue, Kim Jong Un has turned the world's biggest sporting event into a political weapon. WSJ looks at why the Winter Games are so important to Pyongyang.
